titleStmt.title: The history of Ioseph a poem. VVritten by Sir Thomas Salusbury, Barronet, late of the Inner Temple.
Life of Joseph
titleStmt.author: Salusbury, Thomas, Sir, d. 1643.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Harper, for Roger Ball, and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the Golden Anchor in the Strand, neere Temple-Barre,

notesStmt.note: A reissue, with cancel title page, of: The life of Joseph.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
